Text:
Thanks for the upload.

But I recommend everyone that downloaded this game, this or another version, to patch it.
Here you can download the patch and the newer crack: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6573705/Sim_City_Societies_-_Crack_and_Patch_-_v1.04.263

I was able to install the game, but didnÂ´t use the crack since I downloaded the patch+crack from http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6573705/Sim_City_Societies_-_Crack_and_Patch_-_v1.04.263
Everything apparently went fine, but when I try to play the game it crashes or freezes after less than 1 minute, mostly when I place a venue building. My system meets the requirements and iÂ´ve set the game graphics to the lowest.
